about.title: About CRIC AFRIKA SARL
about.subtitle: Leader in industrial equipment in Cameroon for over 15 years
about.metaDescription: Discover CRIC Africa SARL, leader in industrial equipment in Cameroon. Our story, our values, our team.
storyContent: Founded in 2008, CRIC Africa SARL was born from the vision of creating a Cameroonian company capable of meeting the growing needs of the industrial sector for quality equipment and professional technical services.
Since our beginnings, we have supported more than 80 companies in their installation, maintenance and equipment optimization projects.
Today, CRIC Africa is a team of 45 qualified professionals, partnerships with major international brands, and a presence throughout Cameroon.
